events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision involving their car on the highway during rush hour.
The claim was categorized under 'Auto Accident' based on the description of a car collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle this auto accident claim promptly.
The claimant was contacted and the receipt of the accident claim was formally acknowledged.
The claimant was asked to submit the police report, photos of the car damage, and vehicle registration.
Claimant submitted all requested documents including police report, photos, and repair estimate promptly.
Claims investigator began examining submitted evidence and contacted the other party for statements.
Investigation concluded confirming the claimant’s car was damaged in a collision caused by a third party.
A settlement offer covering all repair costs and rental car expenses was proposed to the claimant.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and the prompt handling of the claim.
Management approved the claim based on the investigation results and claimant’s documentation.
The agreed settlement amount was paid to the claimant, covering all repair and related expenses.
The claim was officially closed after confirming receipt of payment and claimant’s acceptance.
All documentation and records for this auto accident claim were archived for future reference.
